attributes.action: Erect a monument in rememberence of David Bowie in Brixton
attributes.background: As I'm sure everyone is aware the icon that is David Bowie left us yesterday (11/1). In rememberence of this great artist the government should fund, organise and erect a monument for him and no place would be more fitting than the place of his birth - Brixton.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition, because this isn't something that Parliament or Government are responsible for.

However, Lambeth Council are accepting suggestions for ways to remember David Bowie and you could consider making your suggestion to them: 

http://love.lambeth.gov.uk/david-bowie/
